problem_text: T V is tangent to the circle, and R and S are points on the circle. What is the value of x to the nearest tenth?
compact_text: TV is tangent to the circle, and R and S are points on the circle. What is the value of x to the nearest tenth?
annotat_text: $\overline{TV}$ is tangent to the circle, and R and S are points on the circle. What is the value of x to the nearest tenth?
